SEARCH
Package com.hanggrian.socialview

Interface SocialView

All Known Implementing Classes:
SocialEditText, SocialTextView, SocialViews
public interface SocialView
Base interface of all social widgets, which usually derived from TextView. Out of the box, there are SocialTextView, SocialEditText, and SocialAutoCompleteTextView. It can also be implemented in any View using SocialViews.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    SocialView.OnChangedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a hashtag, mention, or hyperlink is modified.
    static interface 
    SocialView.OnClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a hashtag, mention, or hyperlink is clicked.

  • Method Details

    • getHashtagPattern

      @NonNull Pattern getHashtagPattern()
      Returns regex that are responsible for finding hashtags. By default, the pattern are #(\w+).

    • getMentionPattern

      @NonNull Pattern getMentionPattern()
      Returns regex that are responsible for finding mentions. By default, the pattern are @(\w+).

    • getHyperlinkPattern

      @NonNull Pattern getHyperlinkPattern()
      Returns regex that are responsible for finding hyperlinks. By default, the pattern are PatternsCompat.WEB_URL.

    • setHashtagPattern

      void setHashtagPattern(@Nullable Pattern pattern)
      Modify regex that are responsible for finding hashtags.
      Parameters:
      pattern - custom regex. When null, default pattern will be used.

    • setMentionPattern

      void setMentionPattern(@Nullable Pattern pattern)
      Modify regex that are responsible for finding hashtags.
      Parameters:
      pattern - custom regex. When null, default pattern will be used.

    • setHyperlinkPattern

      void setHyperlinkPattern(@Nullable Pattern pattern)
      Modify regex that are responsible for finding hashtags.
      Parameters:
      pattern - custom regex. When null, default pattern will be used.

    • isHashtagEnabled

      boolean isHashtagEnabled()
      Returns true if hashtags in this view are spanned.

    • isMentionEnabled

      boolean isMentionEnabled()
      Returns true if mentions in this view are spanned.

    • isHyperlinkEnabled

      boolean isHyperlinkEnabled()
      Returns true if hyperlinks in this view are spanned.

    • setHashtagEnabled

      void setHashtagEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Determine whether this view should span hashtags.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True when spanning should be enabled.

    • setMentionEnabled

      void setMentionEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Determine whether this view should span mentions.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True when spanning should be enabled.

    • setHyperlinkEnabled

      void setHyperlinkEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Determine whether this view should span hyperlinks.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True when spanning should be enabled.

    • getHashtagColors

      @NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList getHashtagColors()
      Returns color instance of hashtags, default is color accent of current app theme. Will still return corresponding color even when isHashtagEnabled() is false.

    • getMentionColors

      @NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList getMentionColors()
      Returns color instance of mentions, default is color accent of current app theme. Will still return corresponding color even when isMentionEnabled() ()} is false.

    • getHyperlinkColors

      @NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList getHyperlinkColors()
      Returns color instance of hyperlinks, default is color accent of current app theme. Will still return corresponding color even when isHyperlinkEnabled() ()} is false.

    • setHashtagColors

      void setHashtagColors(@NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList colors)
      Sets hashtags color instance.
      Parameters:
      colors - Colors state list instance.

    • setMentionColors

      void setMentionColors(@NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList colors)
      Sets mentions color instance.
      Parameters:
      colors - Colors state list instance.

    • setHyperlinkColors

      void setHyperlinkColors(@NonNull android.content.res.ColorStateList colors)
      Sets hyperlinks color instance.
      Parameters:
      colors - Colors state list instance.
